review: Harbiden ben bu oyunu nasıl göz ardı etmişim kendimden utandım. Hong Kong'da geçen çetelerin, mafyaların, polislerin işin içinde olduğu çok keyifli bir yapım olmuş. Dövüş mekanikleri için özel ilgi gösterilmiş. Bence çok keyifli olmuş. Hikayesi klasik gta oyunlarından çok daha iyi bence. Ve evet bence bu oyuna Çin GTA sı diyebilriz. Hong Kong da farklı bir atmosferi hissetmek harika olmuş. Ben her yönüyle beğendim. Açık dünyada Aksiyonu bol fazla kafa yormayan mükemmel bir iş çıkarmışlar. Devamı neden gelmedi ki acaba :(( Gerçekten Gta ya rakip olabilirmiş.

author: {'steamid': '76561198811756632', 'num_games_owned': 237, 'num_reviews': 130, 'playtime_forever': 775, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 773, 'playtime_at_review': 775, 'last_played': 1712096510}
review:
Você assume o papel de um detetive responsável por se infiltrar e acabar com os Sun On Yee, porém, você acaba se envolvendo emocionalmente, agindo contra ordens diretas e tentando de fato ajudar o grupo. 

Em questão de mecânica, temos aqui um jogo que se sobressai ao seus concorrentes de sua época, obviamente não competindo com GTA, diretamente pelo menos, este jogo é muito notório e principalmente divertido. Apesar de adotar uma experiência narrativa mais série, o jogo consegue divertir e criar tensão nos momentos oportunos, além de possuir um protagonista interessante, que é muito simpatizável. Estando graficamente bem, ao ponto de não ter envelhecido mal (pelo menos na minha opinião), a jogabilidade também não está muito atrás, apesar da câmera ser estranha para quem está acostumado com as dos dias de hoje, mas isso é adaptável e não demora muito. Por fim, vale mencionar o mundo aberto em Hong Kong, muito bem ambientado, e tendo a sua cultura, por exemplo, sendo bem aproveitada na narrativa principal, e até em missões secundárias, o aproveitamento por conta da escolha do mapa acaba tendo um aproveitamento mais alto, o que resulta num produto final divertido de explorar e conhecer, mesmo que você esteja 100% focado nas missões principais. 

Eu praticamente nunca digo isso, mas esse jogo poderia de fato ser mais longo, para poder continuar provendo uma experiência divertida e bastante gradual, na questão do tempo que se passa jogando. Em sua promoção padrão, o jogo pode ser adquirido por menos de 10 reais, isso torna a compra quase que obrigatório, porque você vai se divertir. Não se preocupe com o fato de ser um jogo antigo, como eu disse durante o texto, ele envelheceu bem, e mesmo nos dias de hoje, ele tem algumas coisas únicas. Recomendo!

author: {'steamid': '76561198089307551', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 3219, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1747, 'playtime_at_review': 3219, 'last_played': 1711506088}
review: Esse jogo já vale a pena pelo preço normal, em promoção nem se fala. A cidade do jogo é linda, a mecânica de luta corpo a corpo é divertida e a temática das Tríades é interessante. Muita gente diz que é só um GTA na China (na verdade é em Hong Kong 🤓), mas eu acho que o jogo tem personalidade pra se destacar.

review:
1.谈谈手感，刚开始玩没得要领，一直被小喽啰薄纱（主角血真的脆），心态差点崩溃，到后面直接见红eeeee，无限弹反，直接爆种，打遍天下无敌手，化身中国超人，任何邪恶终将绳之以法（昊京脸）！
2.谈谈剧情，线性流程，仿佛看了一场90年代香港警匪片（经典卧底）
3.总结，十几块价格入手不亏

author: {'steamid': '76561199657847162', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 5510, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 5510, 'playtime_at_review': 5510, 'last_played': 1712207228}
review:
ACHIEVEMENT HUNTING #1 - 100% Achievement Review

STORY - 9/10

A captivating story with memorable characters and engaging narrative. It shows what is really like to be in the depths of Hong Kong's world of crime and at the same time in the position of justice. The plot is quite unpredictable and unique in which loyalties are tested and secrets are revealed and it really keeps you on the edge on what would happen next considering the position the Main Character is in. 

MECHANICS - 7/10

For a game that came out in 2012 (2014 for this Edition), the mechanics are Good. The fighting mechanic keeps you engage on dealing against enemies although it gets repetitive later on but you can wear different outfits for different fighting styles, from Drunken Fist to Wing Chun and you can do different finishers especially in the environment. The shooting mechanics is not bad and it is understandable considering Guns are rare in Hong Kong but there is that slow motion mechanic that adds a flare while shooting. The driving mechanic is good, you can do races and test your driving skills without breaking anything in the way and if you don't want to drive and just go to the destination you want to go, use a taxi.

ENVIRONMENT - 9/10

The environment have so much to offer and it feels so alive like you can see people doing different things and even during missions, you can see how others see the situation and even if you are just roaming around, it really feels like you are in Hong Kong and not just some empty and bland city. You will have to see it for yourself if you still haven't played this.

DLCS - 8/10

The DLCS are quite good but The Nightmare in North Point might be a hit or miss for others since the story has a really different approach than the Main Game, you'll see. Year of the Snake DLC on the other hand takes place immediately after the Main Game Storyline and it's good. I recommend going for the Main Story first (Obviously) because even Nightmare in North Point gives spoilers from the Main Story.

ACHIEVEMENTS - 9/10

The Achievements are not hard to get, you can pretty much get all of them while having fun with the game and not just some very grindy achievement progress. You can do it, it is not time consuming. I recommend getting it all 100%.

OVERALL - 9/10

The game is great and would actually play again in the future. I also recommend getting the game during a sale or when it is not on sale, your choice. Would 10/10 automatically if there were Dogs sleeping.

review: Sleeping Dogs é sensacional, realiza aquela vontade de sair batendo em todo mundo desferindo golpes de artes marciais como bruce lee e jackie chan. O jogo é como um gta que se passa em hong kong, possuindo uma história extraordinária, dividida entre seu trabalho como um homem da lei e seu disfarce em uma gangue. A jogabilidade também é muita boa, todos os estilos de lutas também são incríveis, poder usar os cenários nas lutas também tornou o jogo bastante divertido. Queria muito que tivesse uma continuação desse game, eu joguei bastante ele e até platinei. Recomendo DMS!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561199013023898', 'num_games_owned': 107, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 3191, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 229, 'playtime_at_review': 2962, 'last_played': 1712274683}
review:
despite how long ago this game came out, it has some of if not the best combat in any game I've played to date. the ability to gain so many different moves to add to your arsenal makes this game even more re-playable then it already is. 
The missions in this game are amazing as well with some unforgettable moments. 
The driving feels smooth, the gun play as well making all combat in this game amazing.
With how cheap you can get this game its a must play.
This is one of the games that i wish had a sequel even if it doesn't revolve around Wei it would still be an amazing game.

author: {'steamid': '76561199222994663', 'num_games_owned': 161, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 2932, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 224, 'playtime_at_review': 2815, 'last_played': 1712309805}
review:
对于香港街区的场景做的非常优秀，无论是各种霓虹招牌，摆摊小贩，市民都操着一口流利的粤语，非常令人代入体验，战斗系统做的非常优秀，各种功夫招式，招架反击，场景处决真的帅呆了，哪个男人能拒绝这一股“社会”的味儿呢，画面很精美我觉得放到今天也不算特别过时，各种中国元素，音乐，舞狮等等。
阿杰真兄弟，无论被警察抓还是最后被虐待致死也没有出卖沈威。我们是最好的兄弟，看着阿杰的心境变化，从最开始羡慕新安义到加入后面对会不断的有人死亡，到只想安安稳稳和九妹一直经商过日子，再到最后的被虐杀。意难平

喜欢gta这类的非常推荐，但作为一款以中国为背景的游戏，却不支持中文是认真的吗？

author: {'steamid': '76561199142264660', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 210, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 22, 'playtime_at_review': 210, 'last_played': 1712073384}
review: El juego la verdad no es lo que esperaba en ningun momento mis puntos. 1 La jugabilidad: la jugabilidad del juego se me queda super corta hoy en dia a los juegos de actual generacion incluso el gta vice city tiene mas cosar por hacer y eh mas entretenido. 2 La historia: se que llevo pocas hora con este juego pero desde mi punto de vista la historia no me interesa para nada y la siento meh. 3 Los graficos para la epoca: los graficos son parecidos de un juego de 2006 o 2007 siento que no son graficos buenos y la distancia aunque este al maximo se sigue viendo borroso cosa para un juego del 2014 es imperdonable. Puede parecer divertido matar enemigos con una gran cantidad de tenicas pero esa diversion desaparace rapida mente muy similar como la diversion del Dead rising 4

author: {'steamid': '76561198103080979', 'num_games_owned': 174, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 2969, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 650, 'playtime_at_review': 2691, 'last_played': 1712352906}
review:
Bought this a while ago on sale for 3 dollars just to have some random game to play as I studied for some finals I had at the time. Didn't find any dogs, but had a lot of fun regardless. Fluid fighting, lots of other fun mechanics, tons of cars, bikes, and clothes. Story is extremely linear, but still fun and engaging. You're an undercover cop sent to infiltrate a gang that's experiencing some rising tensions with other local gangs in the area. (nothing more so I don't spoil) 

I've enjoyed the game so much that I'm now trying to 100% it. Finished all the main game achievements after a bit of a long grind, just have the DLC ones left.


If this game goes on sale again, get it. You won't regret it at all, will give you atleast 25 hours of fun.
(fun fact: the voice actor for the main character is Dr. Alex Park from The Good Doctor)ctor)

author: {'steamid': '76561198843831064', 'num_games_owned': 870, 'num_reviews': 228, 'playtime_forever': 470, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 128, 'playtime_at_review': 470, 'last_played': 1712025380}
review:
[h1] El GTA Hong Kong que nunca tuvimos. [/h1]

Hablar de Sleeping Dogs es para mí hablar de un juego que sorprende más allá de su concepto, porque si, todo lo que no sea un GTA lo consideramos un clon o una versión alterna y bizarra como lo es Saint Row, hasta que literalmente tenemos un GTA situado en dicho emplazamiento.

En este juego controlaremos a Wei Shen, un policía que regresa a HK para infiltrarse en una de las tríadas más peligrosas del país y anteriores compañeros de vida. Para esto, Wei tendrá que jugar como agente doble, poniendo en juego su moral con el fin de no ser descubierto y poder desarmar a la tríada.

Todo esto lleva a Wei a cuestionar sus valores policiales, intentando mantener su fachada; aunque paulatinamente, Wei se va tomando su trabajo muy serio.

Este legado del True Crime Hong Kong, aporta diferentes mecánicas que resultan curiosas por su enfoque diferente a lo acostumbrado. El grueso de las mecánicas se centra en su sistema de combate, dejando en segundo plano el sistema de disparos. La gracia de este juego es poder combatir y sentirnos en el maestro de artes marciales definitivo, combinado con un sencillo sistema de parkour y el tiempo bala.

El sistema de combate, pese a ser sencillo, tiene su componente difícil. Más allá de los movimientos básicos que nos recuerdan a la serie Arkham, nuestro agente puede aprender nuevas habilidades que nos ayudara a limpiar a los diferentes matones. Lo curioso es que gran parte del juego se basa en las peleas callejeras, dejando en muy segundo plano las persecuciones vehiculares y los tiroteos, que también tienen su truco.

Las misiones que pertenecen a la trama principal son una mezcla de las pertenecientes a las tríadas y las policiales. También, podemos elegir diferentes misiones alternativas y diferentes actividades secundarias, cuáles muchas desencadenan en misiones interesantes y hasta graciosas.

El otro aspecto destacable es su entorno, ya que el mapa es hermoso. Los colores, los tonos, los contrastes; aun con algunos límites y aspectos negativos, todo incita a que lo explores para desbloquear diferentes mejoras. Las calles de esta HK son lo más cercano a lo que podríamos fantasear con un GTA en Asia.

Algo que no mencione anteriormente y es que este juego lo jugué más de 4 veces, un par de ellas en una Xbox 360 y luego en una PS4 (en su versión Definitive). ¿Por qué resalto esto?, porque me sigue sorprendiendo como la historia está bien desarrollada en cada aspecto, desde los personajes que hacen avanzar la trama hasta los eventos que presenciamos. Es este aspecto el que lo hace destacar, como un “clon del GTA” logra tener una historia más que competente… aunque penosamente ya no exista el estudio y su secuela haya sido cancelada ya hace bastantes años.

A pesar de esto, Sleeping Dogs es un juego que recomiendo a todos. No solo cuenta con un sistema de combate interesante y distintivo, además de mejor planteado que la saga GTA; sino que también, cuenta con una historia policial muy bien escrita que se guarda algunos giros para lograr sorprendernos.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030462038', 'num_games_owned': 183, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 4386, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 265, 'playtime_at_review': 4386, 'last_played': 1711995230}
review:
Been wanting to play this game since i first saw it announced back in the Xbox 360 era.
Played on a Ryzen 7 2700x and RX590 Fatboy 8Gb at 1080p with full graphics.

Graphically the games looks really good, sometimes textures might take a bit to load but other than that its great. The City is very lively and has a lot of people in it, and when going to the markets you can hear the people screaming and calling for the custoemrs attention.
Sometimes they will talk in english and sometimes Mandarin or Chineses (not sure what language it is tbh).

The story is really good and has a lot of Tense moments.
Its like watching a Tv Show at times.

Overall, i highly recommend this game to anyone who likes GTA, Def Jam, maybe the OG Saints Row.

review: O jogo em si é muito bom, joguei algumas horas quando usava windows e me diverti bastante, mas me sinto frustrado com um grande problema desse jogo: quando mudei pro linux, quis jogar ele usando o Proton da steam, mas, independente da versão do proton, me deparo com uma das das situações: o jogo não abre, ou, quando abre, tudo que vejo é uma tela branca e o cursor do mouse. é simplesmente injogável no linux. mais chato que isso, é saber que os desenvolvedores obviamente não irão consertar isso, por se tratar de um bug no linux, que não tem suporte oficial ao jogo, e por com certeza haver um interesse ainda menor em portar esse jogo oficialmente para linux.

author: {'steamid': '76561199026523478', 'num_games_owned': 31, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 2145, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 2145, 'playtime_at_review': 2145, 'last_played': 1711880851}
review:
The best ramen recipe:

Ingredients
700ml chicken stock
3 garlic cloves, halved
4 tbsp soy sauce, plus extra to season
1 tsp Worcestershire sauce
thumb-sized piece of ginger, sliced
½ tsp Chinese five spice
pinch of chilli powder
1 tsp white sugar (optional)
375g ramen noodles
400g sliced cooked pork or chicken breast
2 tsp sesame oil

For the garnish:

100g baby spinach
4 tbsp sweetcorn
4 boiled eggs, peeled and halved
1 sheet dried nori, finely shredded
sliced green spring onions or shallots
sprinkle of sesame seeds

STEP 1
Mix 700ml chicken stock, 3 halved garlic cloves, 4 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tsp Worcestershire sauce, a sliced thumb-sized piece of ginger, ½ tsp Chinese five spice, pinch of chilli powder and 300ml water in a stockpot or large saucepan, bring to the boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for 5 mins.

STEP 2
Taste the stock – add 1 tsp white sugar or a little more soy sauce to make it sweeter or saltier to your liking.

STEP 3
Cook 375g ramen noodles following the pack instructions, then drain and set aside.

STEP 4
Slice 400g cooked pork or chicken, fry in 2 tsp sesame oil until just starting to brown, then set aside.

STEP 5
Divide the noodles between four bowls. Top each with a quarter of the meat, 25g spinach, 1 tbsp sweetcorn and two boiled egg halves each.

STEP 6
Strain the stock into a clean pan, then bring to the boil once again.

STEP 7
Divide the stock between the bowls, then sprinkle over 1 shredded nori sheet, sliced spring onions or shallots and a sprinkle of sesame seeds. Allow the spinach to wilt slightly before serving.

review: Overall, "Sleeping Dogs" is praised for its compelling storyline, immersive world, engaging gameplay mechanics, and attention to detail. It offers a unique blend of action, drama, and exploration that appeals to fans of open-world games and crime dramas alike.

author: {'steamid': '76561198308101067', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2770, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 169, 'playtime_at_review': 2770, 'last_played': 1711869300}
review: Игра очень понравилась, хороший детектив, интересный мир который хочется исследовать, драки в этой игре визитная карточка (впечатляющие приёмы), гонки тоже интересны (особенно где ты гоняешь на супер тачке с пулеметами и крошишь врагов), автопарк понравился, разнообразная одежда (особенно классные костюмы из других игр), классно сделаны погони на автомобиле, сюжет про офицера полиции Гонконга Вэй Шен понравился, интересные миссии (второстепенные миссии тоже интересные и не скучные), за караоке отдельный лайк (особенно та миссия где надо ужасно спеть), оружие тоже присутствует в игре и его не мало ( самое веселое это получить по морде рыбой), так же в игре есть паркур( играем в догонялки), DLS интересные. Так же было интересно встречать пасхалки и отсылки.

author: {'steamid': '76561199468058050', 'num_games_owned': 28, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2771, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 2771, 'playtime_at_review': 1476, 'last_played': 1712155915}
review:
游戏在致敬90年代的港片方面做得相当出色。无论是KTV里倒数第三首歌的选择，还是游戏中各种元素的呈现，都让人仿佛回到了那个充满回忆的年代。特别是地图的设计，基本按照真实微缩，让人仿佛置身于香港的街头巷尾。同时，游戏的色调和场景设计也充满了港片的特色，让人在游戏中能够感受到浓厚的港片氛围。游戏还提供了丰富的赛车和战斗体验。玩家可以通过各种操作技巧来控制赛车，享受在赛道上飞驰的快感。而战斗系统则让玩家可以学习各种功夫来折磨敌人，使得战斗过程充满了刺激和乐趣。此外，游戏中还有各种收集要素，让玩家在探索游戏世界的同时，也能够收获满满的成就感。
但是游戏没有中文，虽然有一些汉化版本可供选择，但都存在一定的问题，如翻译不准确、机翻等。其次，游戏中的人物建模有些粗糙

review: Игра неплохая, но многие её называют одной из самых недооценённых игр, но как по мне игра полностью заслужила свою небольшую популярность. В игре убогая физика машин, стрельба. Чем-то игра похожа на гта, хотя до этой серии ей очень далеко.  Хорошо что продолжение данной игре всё таки не сделали, на один разок пойдёт 7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197971499785', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 2831, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 2382, 'playtime_at_review': 956, 'last_played': 1711981524}
review: Great GTA style game set in Hong Kong with its Triad criminal activities and what-not. Some 'unusual' controls and weird car physics take a while to get used to but once I 'acclimatised' to them they worked well enough. Each vehicles seems to have different handling characteristics, which is nice. Much fun to be had in the hand-to-hand combat and shooting. Decently entertaining characters in the story too. Definitely worth a go if you like GTA!

author: {'steamid': '76561198048071332', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1858, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 70, 'playtime_at_review': 1787, 'last_played': 1711822428}
review:
This game is legit awesome. Kung-fu your way around Hong Kong in some of the most enjoyable combat I've experienced in this genre; who says you need guns for fun? The story is genuinely interesting with a main character whose motivations you can understand and get behind. The graphics can be considered dated by today's standards but it doesn't matter to me personally since the art style doesn't need it to be - it feels iconic and timeless. Hong Kong feels alive and there's countless things to do. Also, the soundtrack is absolutely banging.

My only squabble with this otherwise great game is the driving - its not the most realistic but I guess you do get used to it over time. Use a controller if you have one.

If you've ever wished for a GTA like game in a lively, flashy asian city then this is the best I can think of. Also, it's got a Bruce Lee / Enter the Dragon inspired DLC... need I say more?

It goes on sale quite often, easily a must buy if you're into action/kungfu/story driven open world games.

author: {'steamid': '76561197960330148', 'num_games_owned': 799, 'num_reviews': 99, 'playtime_forever': 810, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 685, 'playtime_at_review': 810, 'last_played': 1711674819}
review:
I don't know that Sleeping Dogs is quite on par with a GTA IV. The scathing satire and absurdist humor do some heavy lifting in keeping those titles afloat. Sleeping Dog's more serious tone sometimes made the game feel like a drag.

That said, the things Sleeping Dogs does differently than a GTA title is does exceedingly well. The focus on martial combat and the plethora of hand-to-hand moves you can unlock make the acton sequences pretty engaging. Vehicle movement might not be quite as refined as other titles, but the drifting and action hijack abilities are very fun.

I appreciate the core game can be completed in ~12 hours. If you're a fan of the genre this game is very much worth your time.

author: {'steamid': '76561198085487429', 'num_games_owned': 72, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 1339, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 572, 'playtime_at_review': 1169, 'last_played': 1712036159}
review:
Hong Kong y su magia:

Sleeping Dogs es uno de esos juegos que aunque no envejeció bien, si que tenía un potencial increíble de haber sido una gran competencia para otras franquicias similares.

Aunque cuenta con algunas lagunas narrativas y de desarrollo de personas, es sin duda alguna una historia muy entretenida, en donde su foco de acción es en las artes marciales, lo que hace bastante bueno y entretenido, así como complicado y atractivo los combates y la acción. Hay balaceras, claro que si, pero no es tanto como en otros juegos similares y creo que eso es lo que termina haciendo tan atractivo.

La trama está bien, es entretenida, se siente como una película de categoría B procedente de China, es entretenida, con sus giros argumentativos entretenidos, que te mantienen pegado y queriendo saber un poco más todo.

La verdad, es que, es un juego infravalorado, que tenía un potencial brutal para una secuela, que cuenta con un par de expansiones muy entretenidas y muy bien logradas.

review: Cara eu amei, joguei esse jogo como se estivesse vendo uma série, sempre com o tempo livre só foquei em jogar sleeping dogs e principalmente o modo história, sem contar as dlcs tbm que eu ainda nem joguei que to ansioso para isso, peguei o game em uma promoção mas eu garanto que o preço cheio também vale a pena, o jogo remete muito a Sifu com GTA 4, se você tem algum interesse pode ir fundo, peguei 24 horas em apenas 3 dias de jogo e pretendo mais. só um ponto é que as missoes secundarias ficam um pouco repetitivas mas lembrando que o jogo é de duas gerações atrás ta mt bom, é isso, por mim valeu total meu dinheiro.

review: Played this first on the XBOX360, had to buy it when I saw it was on sale here. One of my favorite games ever - it has a good story, good gameplay, funny writing with serious tones when the story needs, a ton of things to do and a very interesting main character. This PC-port is not the best in the terms of gameplay and camera movement, but it doesn't have any grotesque bugs that make it unplayable. Still mourning over the Sleeping Dogs 2 we'll never have.

author: {'steamid': '76561199160414835', 'num_games_owned': 29, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1368, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 458, 'playtime_at_review': 1368, 'last_played': 1711531418}
review: Saw my cousin play this game a long while back. It caught my attention and i couldnt help but compare it with gta san andreas and vice city and how it was better in certain aspects. Finally got the time to give it a shot and i loved it! Had more fun that i thought i would. Story was captivating and gory. The world setting was pretty cool and the voice acting was dope. It was short but fun playing a double life of cop and a traid member

author: {'steamid': '76561199185908584', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 3859, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3859, 'last_played': 1668963194}
review:
Отличная криминальная драма.
Больше всего мне понравилась атмосфера виртуального Гонконга и увлекательный сюжет.
Ещё в этой игре очень красивый экшен благодаря динамичному геймплею и кинематографичной постановке.
Напоследок хочется похвалить открытый мир и второстепенные миссии. Эти составляющие получились интересными и увлекательными.

У этой игры есть два неприятных минуса. Во-первых, игра явно делалась для консолей, а уже потом портировалась на ПК. Во-вторых, у этой игры по мере продвижения по сюжету чаще начинает идти дождь. Мало того, что это само по себе избитое клише, так ещё и во время дождя становятся особенно заметны недоработки графики.

Но несмотря на эти минусы игра меня очень увлекла. Жаль, что вторая часть так и не вышла.

Отличный боевик на несколько вечеров с прекрасной постановкой, ураганным экшеном, зрелищными драками, чуть менее зрелищными, но не менее экшеновыми перестрелками, ужасной физикой авто, развлекающими и иногда веселящими побочками и кринжовыми DLC

review: Great game with really good story. PC Version is a bit buggy. Would recommend playing on console for best experience. PC version had a lot of issues when sliding over cover in slow motion where you will zip backwards in the wrong direction super fast. Also, sometimes when hit by a car, Wei will not stand back up. I had to reload a save twice due to this bug. Lots of containers in the streets randomly moving. Still, I love this game. Very Fun!

En conclusion, denle una oportunidad (saludos a la renisa gg 💪🏻💯)

author: {'steamid': '76561198031280502', 'num_games_owned': 138, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 2351, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2351, 'last_played': 1675221329}
review:
TL:DR Gameplay is great, Story is unique and awesome, characters are well written, and combat is satisfying. try it out.

So, playing this game first on the Xbox from the "Games For Gold" back on the 360, i loved this game. 
I got it on the PC a few years back cause i missed it, and it was a great idea.
The story is just great, playing Wei really puts you in the mindset of him and everything he has to go through, while also fufilling a self-finding journey.
The few puzzles you do are fairly straightforward whence you learn the systems behind them, even if there are quite frankly too many collectables. 
Combat is fluid, and fairly standard if you enjoy the Assassins Creed/Batman Arkam games.
Plus, this game is what got me into eating Pork Bun, no lie. Sleeping dogs is truly a game that ALWAYS deserved a sequel, but sadly never got one. So it will sadly die a cult loved game.

That's all i got

BUY IT, PLAY IT, LOVE IT.

review: Young and Dangerous, meets Infernal Affairs, with a touch of GTA and Yakuza. From street brawls to police undercover intrigue, street races and karaoke stints, Sleeping dogs blends many elements of other well known open world games and captures the essence of the city (Hong Kong) it emulates, to create a truly one of a kind immersive experience.

author: {'steamid': '76561198049867202', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 149, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 149, 'playtime_at_review': 92, 'last_played': 1711338774}
review:
Estou gostando do game, ta fluido e os gráficos apesar de ser datado e muito bem feito e bonito.
Não tenho um computador da Nasa mas ta rodando super bem. 
Depois que instalei a tradução do game ( vc acha no google ) ficou mais divertido. Nao ta 100% traduzido os dialogos , mas a galera que fez esse patch ta de parabéns , fica aqui o meu obrigado pelo tempo gasto nisso ( tem que agradecer ! )
Pra quem ta com duvidas , compra porque ta na promoção e vc vai se divertir.

author: {'steamid': '76561199206185770', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 2083, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 146, 'playtime_at_review': 1937, 'last_played': 1711265131}
review:
目前玩过最好玩的格斗游戏，如果能出续作的话就更好了！！！一度认为男主的原型是吴京啊哈哈哈！
《热血无赖》是由United Front Games, Feral Interactive（Mac）共同开发，SQUARE ENIX, Feral Interactive（Mac）发行的一款动作冒险类游戏，于2012年8月14日在PC、Xbox360平台发布，2014年10月14日在XboxOne、PS3、PS4平台发售，为《真实犯罪：香港》的重制版和《真实犯罪》系列的重启作。
游戏故事发生在香港，玩家将以卧底警察沈伟（Wei Shen）体验游戏，攻入敌人内部，毁灭全球最顽劣的犯罪团伙。情感元素包含了忠诚与背叛，沈伟（Wei Shen）从攻入敌人核心后开始探寻他自己的动机。

author: {'steamid': '76561199008807796', 'num_games_owned': 36, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 2563, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1613, 'playtime_at_review': 949, 'last_played': 1711567652}
review:
Great game. Even after this long, the game is still a masterpiece.
I love that during missions you have to be careful about how you drive to avoid losing police experience which at least for me adds a sense of role playing.
I love that guns are not a common sight within the game, forcing you to use martial arts as your main form of combat.
The size of the map is a good size for what the game is.
Overall, I think the game is great and even after all this time, the game is still worth playing.

❤️Wei Shen ❤️

author: {'steamid': '76561198964867981', 'num_games_owned': 1397, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 808, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 808, 'last_played': 1711035700}
review:
"Sleeping Dogs" is an incredible game that offers a unique and immersive experience. The game features an engaging plot filled with memorable characters, creating a world that is both gritty and captivating. The slow-building tension keeps you on the edge of your seat, eager to uncover the next twist in the story.

One of the standout aspects of "Sleeping Dogs" is its solid melee combat system. The hand-to-hand combat is fluid and satisfying, making every encounter feel intense and exhilarating. The game also offers a variety of weapons and gunplay, adding another layer of excitement to the gameplay.

In addition to its thrilling action, "Sleeping Dogs" boasts a detailed open-world environment. The city of Hong Kong is beautifully recreated, with bustling streets, vibrant markets, and stunning landmarks. Exploring the city is a joy in itself, as you can immerse yourself in the rich culture and atmosphere.

Furthermore, the game's soundtrack perfectly complements the gameplay, enhancing the overall experience. The music sets the mood for each mission and adds depth to the game's atmosphere.

Overall, "Sleeping Dogs" is a must-play for fans of open-world action games. Its engaging plot, solid combat mechanics, and immersive world make it a standout title.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011067144', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 2124, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2124, 'last_played': 1709457833}
review:
This is a fantastic game; if you need more convincing read on, but otherwise pick it up when you can. It regularly goes on sale, and usually with a hefty discount. 

I’ve heard that this is one of the most underrated games of all time. Now I didn’t play it when it came out, so I can’t tell you how true it is, but I can assure you it is one of the greatest open world games of all time. I’ve played most of big ones, and this one has everything I could ever ask for in the genre. It is well balanced and polished in all aspects. 

A cop named Wei Shen, successfully infiltrates the triads in order to bring them down from the inside. Wei Shen is trained in Kung fu, and doesn’t always agree with police protocol. He is a loose cannon with nothing to lose, and is roped into the seedy underbelly of Hong Kong. Expect a lot of beat downs, chases of all kinds, and cursing out your handler, who just doesn’t understand the pressure you are under. 

Hong Kong becomes your playground. Its a sandbox filled full of collectibles, opportunities to to test your mettle, and to upgrade your moveset. Steal cars, bust criminals, and infiltrate the Sun On Yee triad. Buy clothes and new cars. Race around Hong Kong, gather experience, pray at shrines. Just enjoy the world that they created. A lot of people compare this to the GTA games, but I personally don’t see it. I feel it is closer in tone and gameplay to the Yakuza games, though with a lot more shooting and less minigames.

The game knows exactly what it is, and what you want and delivers on it expertly. The story on paper is nothing special, you can probably guess every single plot point and story beat within the first hour. That doesn’t mean it is bad at all. The game is dripping with style and the atmosphere is top notch. Everything is executed wonderfully. The voice acting is some of best in the open world genre. Every characterization is handled appropriately and each character has enough room to breathe, and grow. The acting and animations really do carry the story but that isn’t a bad thing at all. The game at times has an urgency to it that most others wish they could achieve and as the stakes grow higher and higher, everything starts devolving into chaos. Shen loses sight of big picture multiple times, and the voice actor for him really sells that over time this no longer just a job, but is personal.  

The soundtrack is good enough, but after about 10 hours you have heard everything on the radio at least twice. Which is to be expected as it is standard for the genre, but its a well understood flaw. If you play the game for 30 hours, ideally you would want 30 hours of music, but there is only around 3 hours of music (including the stock music). 

The game is not without flaws. The DLC (included in the definitive edition) expands the story some but isn’t particularly long. You can finish all three in around 3 hours. The achievements in the DLC are just grindy and unless you are going for 100% don’t bother. Also the game handles the radio in such a way that it seems to repeat the playlist every time it is interrupted by a cutscene. At points in the game I heard the beginning of the same song 3-5 times in a row. There is a “dating” mechanic, but it consists of you taking someone out on a date once, and that is it. You never hear from those characters ever again.

Otherwise the game is fantastic. Its runs well, looks good, and plays well. The fun story is just icing on the cake. I had no problems running it on Windows 11, outside of a few crashes, but I never lost more than 5 minutes worth of progress. Just remember to save regularly. 

Highly Recommended

author: {'steamid': '76561198158682660', 'num_games_owned': 204, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 1104, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1, 'playtime_at_review': 1065, 'last_played': 1711523427}
review:
NICK KANG > WEI SHENG.

Seriously great game, desperately needs a sequel. 

Anybody from the PS2/XBOX era will instantly be reminded of the True crime series and how good it was.

Developers don't really seem to go for this over the top action/mechanics with open world games anymore & its a shame because doing it right has given us one of the best melee combat systems seen in a game, akin to the Middle Earth games. 

pretty old game so runs perfectly maxed out @4K & the graphics & art style still hold up beautifully with an open world rendition of Hong Kong, done so well that it is in the GTA IV class of world design.

Buy this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198070516398', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1300, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1300, 'last_played': 1710699678}
review:
I got the game for $2.99 and for that price, it's a 10/10. 

At retail price, this game is a 9/10.

Story: Overall it's great. Starts off really strong but loses a little momentum on the second half. You start to care for the characters right away but some are introduced at a later stage that didn't pay any role in the beginning, throwing it off a bit. 

Graphics: Hong Kong looks great and alive. Tons of NPCs, vehicles, neon signs, tall buildings, vendors, etc. The main characters looks great, but NPCs lack quality. Overall i liked the atmosphere. 

Gameplay: The game is combat first, shooting second. The combat feels solid with a lot of variety in how to apply damage. You find collectibles to learn new moves, which is executed really well. I was able to locate the necessary items by simply processing through the story. There are also a bunch of chase sequences, which are somewhat fun. 
You drive from mission to mission with other activities to do, such as races, cock fights, combat arena, massages, crimes randomly occurring in the city, etc.
The game awards you with great content for completing missions. You get full outfits, vehicles, money, apartments, just for doing some quests. 
The shooting is not great and it's hard to be accurate with specific guns. Cover system works well and the shooting segments are short. 
Driving is GTA like, focused on drifts, damaging cars with a ramming feature, some cars have guns attached to them. There are boats, scooters, motorcycles. There is no customization.
Tons of collectibles that provide all sorts of updates.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067395321', 'num_games_owned': 186, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 1637, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 511, 'playtime_at_review': 631, 'last_played': 1711308747}

author: {'steamid': '76561199052239923', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 867, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 241, 'playtime_at_review': 432, 'last_played': 1711903038}
review:
Title: My Thoughts on Sleeping Dogs

So, I've been playing this game called "Sleeping Dogs" and let me tell you, it's been a blast.

First off, the world-building? Amazing. I feel like I'm walking the streets of Hong Kong myself, with all the hustle and bustle around me. It's immersive, to say the least.

The activities? Well, they're not your run-of-the-mill stuff. Sure, you've got your typical action scenes, but karaoke? That's a whole different level of fun. I mean, who would've thought singing off-key in a virtual bar could be so entertaining?

Now, onto the story. Playing as Wei Shen, an undercover cop, is intense. I'm torn between my duty and the criminal world, and every decision feels important. The character design is cool, and the supporting cast adds depth to the whole experience.

But, it's not all sunshine and rainbows. I wish there were more chances to go on dates with the girls I meet. I mean, come on, a little romance never hurt anyone, right? And the steering? Let's just say it could use some improvement.

Overall, "Sleeping Dogs" is a solid game. It's got everything I look for: action, a good story, and some unexpected surprises along the way. If you're into immersive worlds and unique gameplay, give it a shot. You won't be disappointed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198122689053', 'num_games_owned': 376, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 1290, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 16, 'playtime_at_review': 1274, 'last_played': 1712115210}
review:
这是一款描绘港台帮派势力内部斗争的游戏，作为主角的我们将扮演卧底警员-沈威，在这一过程中有互相构陷，也有兄弟情义，但更多的是帮派卧底与警察身份两种身份的冲突与无奈。在最后坏人虽然被绳之以法，但好人也因为我们一步一步地向前迈进而所剩无几，失落感很大。
优点：
1.游戏绝大部分靠的是拳脚连击、闪避格挡，枪支所能使用的关卡很少，也因次给人一种自己单人立棍的爽点。
2.虽然这是一款类GTA风格的游戏，但因为独特的警察/卧底系统，如果你选择大杀特杀、血流成河、所见皆敌的打法，在警察身份方面就会丢失极大量的经验值，制作组是真的设计到了主角是卧底这一身份，而不是一个无法无天的第四天灾。
3.剧情冲突转折合理，人物行为设计符合逻辑，比如朱妈妈儿子和女婿婚礼当天被自己儿子的黑帮伙伴杀害，朱妈妈拿菜刀把做仇人柔馅料的愤恨。
4.亲切的国语配音和俚言俗语，颇有80-90年代港片电影的风采，你在游玩的过程中像是看一部能自己操作的电影，你就是主角。
5.如果你厌烦了各种拯救世界、魔王勇者的俗套故事，那么在这里斗个鸡、打个牌，看看80-90年代的港岛是什么样子也是一种不错的选择。

缺点：
1.无法与好友一起游玩，没法体验一起刀剑火山，这应该是最大的缺点。

2.没有枪支，刀和棍棒是消耗品，如果不小心打了敌人多的部分容易来回死。
解决：一开始也就是1-2章的时候钱不要花，拿剧情结束的钱去买传说套装+40-60%的近战伤害，如果你是向我一般，什么都没穿，前期误入12宫的格斗剧情，那就得磨了_(:з」∠)_。
3.因为是港岛地区独特的靠左行驶，在一开始会来回撞车。
4.交通车辆购买系统，他是你必须得参加赛车比赛才能解锁特地的车辆，所以游戏你不熟悉的赛道，或者是你前期不熟悉的操作，很难买到心仪的车辆。
解决：提前漂移打入弯道；不老老实实走马路，利用人行道。
其实很少用到自己的车；远了打出租车，近了路边找，过剧情方面完全不用买自己特别想要的那种。

5.剧情太少了，不够玩。
比如主角当时大佬变成-威哥的时候，可能是过度太快了吧，少了一种当大佬的释放——第四天灾本质暴露了。

6.敌人就那个几层皮套，多来些就好了。

这是一款瑕不掩瑜的游戏，有的几个缺点更多的是想让他延长的失落。
所以这是一款不那么好的给他爱吧，但他真的别具匠心独有一凡风味，值得我们花些时间细细的品味。

author: {'steamid': '76561198803949645', 'num_games_owned': 125, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 3221, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3221, 'last_played': 1710866545}
review: RECOMENDADO y COMPLETADO al 100% con el precio que lo puedes conseguir en oferta pues es un muy buen juego ya que te trae no solo el juego base sino que también 2 dlc que no son muy largos pero si son entretenido y da mas variedad al juego, a pesar que a primera vista parece un simple gta ambientado en Hong Kong pues... la verdad a la jugarlo cambia completamente la perspectiva del juego ya que a diferencia de otros este se centra mas que todo en el combate y no se siente muy forzado a, si tiene partes en las que hay tiroteos pero son ocasionales. Aun que no sea "tan mundo libre como gta" ya que hay zonas que no son accesibles igual no se ciente completamente cerrado, es cierto que hay unas cuantas cosas que si han envejecido mal por ejemplo (los taxis, acceder a las armas y la punteria) pero gran parte del gameplay no a habido grandes problemas.

author: {'steamid': '76561198153678695', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 4704, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 927, 'playtime_at_review': 3747, 'last_played': 1712391198}
review:
Its an amazing game that im sucked into the game for 62 hours. When it first came out, it doesnt really look like HK tbh. But now when i look back, as a HKer, it did capture a lot of element of HK in my generation in the game, its amazing. The story is simple but good, gameplay is awesome, u can stay in the car, listening to the radio, and just enjoy the view of HK. 

Highly recommended, and hopefully someday, although its not quite possible, there will be another open-world game with HK background.

review:

Will Yun Lee is now governor of California and is expecting his second child with Taylor Swift.

Unfortunately, when I got back in time to murder Hitler, I created a fork in timelines and if you are reading this, you and I are on the wrong timeline. Square Enix published in the recent years (*checks notes*) "Forspoken" and "The Quiet Man".

I am deeply sorry. Please forward all death threats to the usual address.

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561197999040745', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 2157, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2157, 'last_played': 1710706336}
review:
Sleeping Dogs 8/10

TLDR  = Really fun game in a vibrant setting.

+ Melee Combat.
+ Really Fun Gameplay.
+ Story.
+ Graphics.
+ Soundtrack.
+ Side Missions.
+ Side Activities.
+- Characters.
+ Details.
+ Selection of Cars.
+ Character Comedians
+ Interesting way to unlock certain Skills.
+ Cop Gameplay is Decent.
-----------------------------

-+ Driving.
- Repetitive missions.
- Bugs + Glitches.
- DLCs were pretty boring
- Menu Navigation Sucks.
- Where is sequel :(
- Gun play

Overall fun game I wish there was a sequel.

author: {'steamid': '76561198071021771', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 2838, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2838, 'last_played': 1690871906}
review:
Me he terminado éste juego 4 veces, 2 en PC, 1 en Steam Deck y 1 en consola. Puedo decir con toda seguridad que sigue siendo uno de los mejores juegos que haya jugado. Una historia como película de acción corta (12hrs) pero con gran intriga y complejidad. El combate sigue siendo mejor que muchos juegos de éste año. Y los gráficos se siguen manteniendo impresionantes y al mismo tiempo pide pocos recursos. No te lo pienses dos veces si planeas comprarlo, busca una rebaja y tómalo. Los DLC son pura diversión.
Para los que les gusta tener todos los logros, éste juego aún tiene los servidores de Square Enix activos para obtenerlos todos.

author: {'steamid': '76561198379533597', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 703, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 703, 'last_played': 1710544985}
review:
esse jogo é cheio de surpresas, não to falando só da história em si, mas sim a quantidade de conteúdo para um jogo que foi feito em 2012, eu realmente fiquei surpreso com a diversidade de coisas para fazer no mapa, muito triste pensar que esse jogo não vai ter uma sequência ou algo do tipo, porém eu to muito satisfeito com o jogo em si, com oque ele entrega, os graficos são muito bons, até hoje, a ambientação em si é absurdamente boa, fora a quantidade de pessoas nas ruas, assim como é hong kong, eles conseguiram transmitir isso muito bem, e lembrando, 2012!!! a minha única crítica ao jogo em si é a gun play do jogo que achei meio travada, e acho que ela foi muito utilizada depois que foi apresentada, e toda hora que tinha parte da missão que era trocação de tiro eu ficava meio desanimado, por mais que a gameplay do combate em si seja boa pra cacete e comparada a gameplay de tiro do game, a de combate foi mais usada, eu acho que não me incomodaria se o jogo fosse inteiramente no soco, mas isso seria impossível já que o universo em que o jogo se passa contribui para o uso de armas de fogo, enfim, não foi algo que me impediu de jogar até o final, história muito boa, gameplay insana, e um protagonista muito bom.

só compra isso logo meu fi.

author: {'steamid': '76561198083843891', 'num_games_owned': 112, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 1153, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1152, 'last_played': 1710540986}
review:
Для тех кто любит фильмы Джон Ву и не только это, чувствуется  и Джеки чан и Брюс Ли ну и многие гонконгские режиссёры определённо в этой игре есть Атмосфера своя, сюжет конечно с неба звёзд не хватает но вполне себе в антураже лёгкий без какой-либо сильной драмы.
Я когдато начал проходить при релизе когда она толька вышла но тогда почему-то я её забросил решил вернуться через какую время и не пожалел об этом действительно моментами игра впечатляет особенно боёвкой и даже графикой , при дождливой погоде графика как будто преображается всё очень красиво становится и очень кинематографично .
 Сам город, а именно Гонконг, очень красивый. Сначала кажется, что карта слишком маленькая, но в самой игре есть где развернуться. Иногда даже слишком — присутствует как минимум пара открытых, но абсолютно пустых зданий. Передвигаешься в основном на машине, но можно вызвать такси. Что круто — на точку задания можно заехать и миссия сразу начнётся. Физика немного всратая, но быстро привыкаешь. Так же быстро, как и к левостороннему движению. Но к тому, что руль находится справа, я так и не привык за всё прохождение. Из минусов — даже на самой быстрой тачке хер ты уйдёшь от копов, нужно либо перепрыгивать в другую машину (да, тут так можно), или же избавляться от хвоста. В гонках такого "кетчупа" нет, что радует. Пешком же передвигаться не так интересно, ибо зачастую задания находятся далеко, а паркур, к сожалению, используется во всей красе только во время миссий. Обидно, но не критично, ещё и то, что нельзя прыгать и идти шагом, даже на геймпаде.

 Музыкальное сопровождение хорошее. Много разных песен с азиатским колоритом, но мне больше всего запомнился момент, когда срочно надо бежать к мотоциклу и сматываться, только стартанул — заиграли Opeth! Для меня это было полнейшей неожиданностью и после этого я понял, что точно стоит отдельно заценить OST.
 
По своему потраченному времени скучать не буду мне она очень понравилась и DLC тоже очень крутые всем советую 7.5.

author: {'steamid': '76561198892413590', 'num_games_owned': 281, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 2092, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2092, 'last_played': 1688032020}
review:
对于香港街区的场景做的非常优秀，无论是各种霓虹招牌，摆摊小贩，市民都操着一口流利的粤语，非常令人代入体验，战斗系统做的非常优秀，各种功夫招式，招架反击，场景处决真的帅呆了，哪个男人能拒绝这一股“社会”的味儿呢，画面很精美我觉得放到今天也不算特别过时，各种中国元素，音乐，舞狮等等。
阿杰真兄弟，无论被警察抓还是最后被虐待致死也没有出卖沈威。我们是最好的兄弟，看着阿杰的心境变化，从最开始羡慕新安义到加入后面对会不断的有人死亡，到只想安安稳稳和九妹一直经商过日子，再到最后的被虐杀。意难平

喜欢gta这类的非常推荐，但作为一款以中国为背景的游戏，却不支持中文是认真的吗？

在此致敬所有的警察同志，是你们赌上生命的战斗才换来了我们人民的安居乐业，希望社会变得更加和平，世界上的罪犯越来越少，各位警察同志们也能享受平安幸福的生活，向你们致以最真挚的敬意

author: {'steamid': '76561198094443473', 'num_games_owned': 43, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 935, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 415, 'last_played': 1710521326}
review: Great story line, with good environment which reacts to the main character. For a small studio they had outdone themselves. GTA can take some cues from this. They should've further continued on with the sequels. I was long overdue to play this.

review: Não recomendo. Confesso que o jogo me prendeu bastante no inicio com esse combate intenso, porém em uma certa missão o jogo começou a roubar descaradamente, na missão há inimigos e eles possuem facas envenenadas, você precisa matar 30 inimigos para avançar... Porém em alguns momentos eu desviava do golpe e ainda sim era envenenado, o que fodia completamente o resto da missão. Em outros momentos eu nem precisava desviar, mas o npc esfaqueava o ar e contava que tinha me envenenado. Enfim, não sei se é proposital ou se é um bug, já tentei reinstalar o game e continuar mas continua do mesmo jeito e é frustrante. Eu kitei e pronto, fica ao seu critério

author: {'steamid': '76561199205285173', 'num_games_owned': 139, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 2599, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1, 'playtime_at_review': 2589, 'last_played': 1711318590}
review:
La focaccia italiana se usa como una alternativa al pan y existen variantes de la receta, pero todas las que encuentres van a tener en común el aceite de oliva. ¿Sabían que los italianos le dicen “oro líquido” al aceite de oliva extra virgen? Y sí. Me parece una expresión súper acertada. Todo queda mejor con aceite de oliva. Ya les dije una vez, si nos cruzamos por la calle tengan cuidado que les tiro un poco de aceite de oliva por encima. Soy amante del buen aceite. Que rico es!

Su masa es similar a la de la pizza, solo que es más aireada, y en vez de hornearla con salsa de tomate, se aliña con aceite de oliva, sal gruesa, hierbas y alguna otra cosa que quieran agregar… Puede ser tomate o aceitunas. Todo bien mediterráneo siempre, claramente. A pesar de ser un plato típico de Italia, la focaccia es una preparación muy popular en todas partes del mundo. Además es muy sencilla de hacer!

Una opción muy buena es hacer esta receta de focaccia rellena. Se sigue la receta tal cual está más abajo, con la diferencia que se divide en dos partes iguales, se estira la primer parte, se distribuye el relleno y luego se tapa con la otra mitad. Y después todo igual, siguen la receta como si nada hubiese pasado.

Pueden rellenarla con tomate, queso y albahaca y hacerla caprese. Con cebolla y queso, con morrón, con jamón. Es tu momento para aprovechar lo que tengas en la heladera y se lo sumes! Espero que disfruten la receta. Cuentenme si la hacen y si les gustó! Manos a la masa!



Ingredientes
400 gr de harina 000
30 gr de levadura de cerveza
250 ml de agua tibia
1 cdita de sal
1 cdita de azúcar
Aceite de oliva
Sal gruesa
Opcionales (para condimentar): romero, aceitunas, tomate, orégano

review: Solid game considering the time it was launched at. It had to compete with other big hits like GTA and Watch Dogs but it still managed to pull through and for me at least, offered one of the best gaming experiences during my teens. The world building and music choice is still incredible to this day, giving you the definitive way to roam around Hong Kong. The story isn't bad either but it's very linear with no choices to be made at all.

Tiene una buena historia que atrapa hasta el final, tiene acción, cosas que hacer endgame y bastante contenido. Platinarlo es bastante accesible. Los 2 DLC son bastante cortos, pero tienen mecánicas nuevas y cosas interesantes que hacer así que me parecen divertidos. Obviamente tiene algunos bugs pero nada que impida jugarlo. 10/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198431601110', 'num_games_owned': 105, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 2158, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2158, 'last_played': 1710111438}
review:
Muchos comparan a este juego con GTA, opinión que yo no puedo compartir ni tampoco refutar puesto que nunca he jugado un GTA. 
A mi parecer este es un muy buen juego, enfocado más en la acción marcial que en disparos y explosiones, una historia interesante de policías y ladrones que, para evitar spoilers, no detallare; varios elementos que dan vida al entorno y dos DLCS ya incluidos que alargan el tiempo de juego.
Lo único malo que podría decir sobre este juego, es que no posee guardado en la nube ni otro medio alterno de almacenamiento, por lo que recomiendo que completen el juego antes de desinstalarlo, caso contrario todo el progreso se perderá.

review: This is a great game that still holds up relatively well ~8 years later. The 4 skill trees feel satisfying and start you off feeling slightly under-powered in combat to shredding through enemies by the end of the game after various upgrades. The core game-play loop is very fun and while the general combat isn't too difficult, there are challenges available for people looking for that experience. I personally didn't notice the lack of fast-travel because driving / experimenting with all the different cars was tons of fun and I didn't mind driving around the immersive map. Truly a masterpiece and I'd recommend for people who don't mind slightly outdated graphics!

review:
Sleeping Dogs is an underrated gem that deserved so much more recognition. The attention to detail in recreating Hong Kong's vibrant atmosphere is breathtaking. The story and characters are incredibly well-written, and the combat system's fluid martial arts moves make you feel like a true master (I slapped everyone with fish).

It's a travesty that this brilliant open-world action-adventure game never received a proper sequel after its critical acclaim. I've replayed Sleeping Dogs multiple times, and it's always an enjoyable experience that stays with you long after finishing it. 10/10 would play again. Hopefully, we'll get a sequel someday and the developer can bounce back from the cancellation.

If you're a fan of open-world games or gritty crime dramas (like Mafia or Yakuza), do yourself a favor and play this underappreciated gem. Sleeping Dogs is a true hidden masterpiece that more people need to experience.

author: {'steamid': '76561198094881384', 'num_games_owned': 142, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 2272, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2272, 'last_played': 1697846220}
review:
Sleeping Dogs est une vrai pépite bien trop souvent comparé a un GTA Like , pour moi il ne l'est pas et il arrive même a être sont propre jeu a lui même.

Le systeme de combat et de visé a l'arme sont complètement différent ont peut infligé des finish aux ennemie, vous aller vous devoir autant joué flic que ripoux et le jeu sais dosé quand, ce qui permet parfois de soufflé un peut et de ne pas toujours faire la même choses.
Les personnage sont incroyables et attachant, l'histoire est juste folle est bien écrite, non clairement je me suis bien amusé sur ce jeu et a le platiné.

Les plus : 
- Le gameplay 
- l'environnement 
- Le Lore 
- les musiques
- les personnages
- finisher dans les combats
- graphisme
------------------------
Les moins :
- le systèmes de visé a combat main nue et pas dingue 
- la conduite est meh mais passe
- le contenue des dlc est beaucoup trop long je trouve 

En sois je vous le conseille vraiment, si vous aimez la bagarre, la corruption,les yakuza vous aller vraiment passé un bon moment.

author: {'steamid': '76561198126048071', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 1519, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1519, 'last_played': 1461600519}
review:
Sleeping Dogs, developed by United Front Games and published by Square Enix, takes players on a thrilling journey through the bustling streets of Hong Kong. Released in 2012, the game combines an open-world setting, gripping narrative, and intense martial arts combat. In this comprehensive review, we'll explore the various aspects of the game, highlighting its strengths and addressing some drawbacks, particularly in the car mechanics. Sleeping Dogs features a visually stunning representation of Hong Kong, capturing the vibrant cityscape with impressive attention to detail. The character models are well-designed, and the environments are richly textured, creating an immersive atmosphere. The game excels in delivering a cinematic experience, with dynamic lighting and weather effects enhancing the overall visual appeal. The gameplay of Sleeping Dogs seamlessly blends exploration, combat, and driving elements. As Wei Shen, an undercover cop, players navigate the streets, engage in hand-to-hand combat, and participate in thrilling chase sequences. The martial arts combat is a standout feature, offering a fluid and responsive system that allows players to execute impressive combos and counters. The variety of missions and side activities keeps the gameplay diverse and entertaining. Sleeping Dogs boasts a compelling narrative that explores the complexities of undercover police work and loyalty. The characters are well-developed, and the voice acting is top-notch, immersing players in the gritty world of crime and corruption. The narrative's twists and turns add depth to the storyline, making it one of the game's strongest elements. The open-world design of Hong Kong in Sleeping Dogs encourages exploration, with a plethora of side missions, collectibles, and activities scattered throughout the city. From participating in illegal street races to solving cases as a detective, the game offers a variety of content that adds value to the overall experience. While Sleeping Dogs excels in many areas, the one notable drawback lies in its car mechanics. The driving controls can feel somewhat floaty and imprecise, impacting the overall experience during chase sequences and missions requiring precise maneuvering. The physics of the vehicles might be inconsistent, occasionally leading to frustrating moments, especially in high-speed pursuits. The game's sound design, including ambient noise and voice acting, contributes to the immersive atmosphere of Hong Kong. The soundtrack, featuring a mix of traditional Chinese music and modern tunes, complements the setting and enhances the overall experience.

Sleeping Dogs offers a captivating blend of engaging gameplay, a rich narrative, and a meticulously crafted open-world environment. Despite a minor flaw in its car mechanics, the game shines in delivering a gripping experience that keeps players invested in Wei Shen's journey. With its compelling story, dynamic combat system, and the vibrant backdrop of Hong Kong, Sleeping Dogs remains a standout title in the action-adventure genre.

author: {'steamid': '76561197991756666', 'num_games_owned': 2625, 'num_reviews': 114, 'playtime_forever': 148, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 148, 'last_played': 1659385724}
review:
[h1]YOU MAY HAVE HAD YOUR ORIGINS[/h1]

On your playstation, something like [i]YAKUZA[/i], for me, JRPG,
It was THIS [b]Sleeping Dogs.[/b]

I loved it. It set a standard for me, I thought it was a really great production.
There wasn't a thing I thought, the creators didn't think of;
-the game looked good,
-it was cinematic,
-there was MO-CAP, the lead protagonist is a real life actor,
-the streets of the city were bustling & the side carts with the foods & snacks, the shops, you could enter & patronise,
-the impression is deep, the open world was wonderfully created,
-vehicles & weapons were available,
-the city & the AI, installed responses, have had me curious as to how life really is in that part of the world
[spoiler]-FULL ENGLISH AUDIO (*speaks in english)[/spoiler]

[h3]SO, NOW[/h3]

Instinctively when I play the JRPG, or so, my mind has a canvas which is this game,
& all judgements & comparisons I encounter in my mind are played against what I experienced 
here.

Even on it's own, this greatly influenced me as what was a quality game.

This here Definitive Edition obviously upgraded the appearance of the original game.

It isn't merely a recommendation it's somewhat a welcoming for you from my side,

[spoiler]the game get's discounted often-absolutely G E T [/spoiler]

[u]ENJOY & HAVE FUN[/u]

review: Долго проходил мимо этой игры, как оказалось зря! Если не рассматривать игру, как клон гта, привыкнуть к управлению автомобилем и немногочисленной стрельбе, то это весьма не дурный боевичек, с отличным сюжетом, мощной боевкой и драйвовыми спецэфектами) очань схож со старенькой игрой true crime.

author: {'steamid': '76561198091155767', 'num_games_owned': 278, 'num_reviews': 137, 'playtime_forever': 2997, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2997, 'last_played': 1709771360}
review:
Un buen sandbox singleplayer más arcade que GTA IV en su día. El sistema de combate se ve bien pero no posee mucha profundidad, y si no fuera por una sólida historia principal y un sistema de conducción más pulido y responsivo que el de GTA, pues la verdad es que no sería una experiencia muy divertida.
Los gráficos envejecieron bien, no se notan demasiados modelos peruanos para haber salido en el 2012. Sin embargo, Sleeping Dogs no destaca ni busca diferenciarse de ninguna forma del resto de juegos del montón, con un sistema de combate sacado de AC, un mundo abierto similar al de una isla cualquiera de GTA/Dead Island, y lo único que hace la experiencia interesante es la historia ciertamente interesante debido a las diferentes alianzas e intereses que Wei tiene dentro de la misma. Me hubiera gustado la presencia de finales alternativos, así como objetivos secundarios dentro de las misiones, pero imagino que eso excedía el presupuesto y el tiempo de los desarrolladores. 
Sin más que decir, si encuentran la versión definitiva en oferta, es un buen sandbox para pasar el tiempo, lo más interesante es la narrativa del mismo, cosa poco común en esta clase de juegos. Los autitos que podes comprar están muy facheros también para la época.

author: {'steamid': '76561199528087119', 'num_games_owned': 85, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 2005, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2005, 'last_played': 1697886841}
review:
Игра переносит вас в роль Вей Шена, подпольного полицейского, который вступает в ряды триад, чтобы проникнуть в их организацию и разоблачить их криминальные дела. Ваш персонаж сталкивается с множеством опасностей, включая враждебные банды, коррумпированных полицейских и множество интриг.

Одним из ключевых аспектов игры является боевая система, которая позволяет использовать комбинации ударов, блокирование, контратаки и использовать окружение для победы в схватках. Кроме того, вы имеете возможность вести персональное расследование, исследуя город и собирая доказательства.

Гонконг, который воссоздан в игре, полон жизни и деталей: оживленные улицы, небоскребы, тайные храмы, китайские рынки и многое другое. Вы можете свободно перемещаться по этому миру на автомобилях, мотоциклах или пешком, исследуя его разнообразные районы и выполняя различные миссии.

author: {'steamid': '76561199039933586', 'num_games_owned': 29, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 204, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 20, 'playtime_at_review': 184, 'last_played': 1712083414}

author: {'steamid': '76561198324065369', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 780, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 780, 'last_played': 1707339791}
review:
A lot to unpack here... If you're a fan of the "gun-kata" genre you will be at the very, very least entertained for the first couple hours. {Think Jet Li movies...}

While the map is relatively small it feels incredibly busy which is both a positive and a negative aspect. The streets feel lived in and alive but there is simply not a whole lot in the way of interacting with the environment. The characters are bland and kinda seem like an afterthought at times.,This goes beyond your cliche kung fu flick and dives face first into sheer laziness. The combat is pretty standard {hit, parry, block, throw etc..}

All of this makes the game feel very arcade-esque and like a really bad GTA/True Crime knockoff. Tries to be silly at times that should be serious ...

There are some weapons but this is commie china *fart* so they're scarce. Driving is ridiculously terrible and there aren't really any notable rides. Overall the game is a resounding "okay" and I prefer it to over the top nonsense like Yakuza. However, I have never been able to beat the game because to put it simple and blunt... it's a little boring.

I'll recommend for Kung Fu nerds with low standards, other than that it's a forgettable bust. Could have given us a good True Crime sequel but this game really misses the mark.

review:
there are two types of 7/10 games: those too big to fail but fail anyway as they collapse under the enormous weight of their scientifically engineered emptiness, and those whose foundations can't support their massive heart and soul

Sleeping Dogs is in the latter category. It's a shame big publishers make so much less games like this nowadays.

author: {'steamid': '76561198845090317', 'num_games_owned': 49, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 6064, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6064, 'last_played': 1709416113}
review:
Sleeping dogs definitive edition jest to kontynuacją gry serii True Crime 
z gatunku gier akcji. Historia opowiada tym razem policjanta Wei Shena ,który postanawia wrócić do Hong Kongu , żeby walczyć z chińską mafią Sun On Yee.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Plusy:
+ dobra fabuła
+ klimat
+ grafika
+ dużo pobocznych aktywności
+ muzyka
+ walka

Minusy:
- strzelanie
- tryb jazdy
- wygląd npc (tłum)
- za mało miłosnych wątków
- czasami błędy lub bugi
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Podsumowując nie jest to gra bez wad , ale to dobra produkcja z ciekawą fabułą i rozgrywką
. Jeśli ktoś lubi gry a'la GTA lub azjatyckie klimaty to kupuj od razu (najlepiej w przecenie)

Par contre, je conseille d'y jouer avec une manette, Sleeping Dogs étant un portage de jeu PS3, le passage de la manette au clavier n'est pas des plus optimisés (sans pour autant rendre le jeu injouable)

author: {'steamid': '76561198387639090', 'num_games_owned': 100, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 2877, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2877, 'last_played': 1709328656}
review:
Plusy:
- Hongkong
- Podczas jazdy pojazdem pokazuję się strzałka gdzie trzeba skręcić
- Sterowanie podczas walki wręcz
- Fabuła
- Zadania poboczne
- Różne stroje z bonusami
- Zróżnicowane pojazdy, którymi można jechać
- System randek
- Szczanie
- Sposób uczenia się nowych umiejętności
- Karaoke
- Główna postać, która jest bardzo dobrze napisana
- Grafika
- Audio
- Walki kogutów
- Fajnie zrobione wyścigi
- Komiczna postać faceta od fur, który podczas dostarczania nam pojazdu potrafi wpieprzyć się nim w inne samochody
- DLC Rok węża (W porównaniu do Koszmaru w North Point ma nawet ciekawą fabułę)
- Turnej Zodiak
- Zróżnicowanie zadań: od strzelanin przez wyścigi i bijatyki do włamań i uciekaniu przed policją oraz "terrorystami"
- System reputacji
- Znajdźki w postaci kapliczek, skrzynek z pieniędzmi, statuetek i toreb z dowodami
- Bardzo przyjemna jazda po mieście

Minusy:
- Automatyczny ruch kamery podczas cofania, który mi zawsze przeszkadzał
- Czasami mi grę wywaliło
- Dziwne jest to, że nie można w tej grze swobodnie skakać
- DLC Koszmar w North Point (Dla mnie totalnie nieciekawa fabuła i podczas grania miałem wrażenie, że twórcy coś wzięli podczas pracy nad tym dodatkiem)

Ocena gry: 9.6/10

review: J'ai jamais vu un jeu de kung-fu aussi frustrant et je me demande comment j'ai fait pour acheter ça.  Wei Shen est une vraie mauviette car il meurt rapidement et ça prend 10 000 ans pour tuer un mec car il frappe comme une gonzesse. Quant à la conduite, c'est assez fade. True Crime: Streets of L.A. et Streets of New York étaient bien. Je retourne rejouer à True Crime sur PS2.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013017981', 'num_games_owned': 788, 'num_reviews': 518, 'playtime_forever': 1700, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1700, 'last_played': 1709257813}
review:
Un policía encubierto en [b]Estados Unidos[/b] vuelve a su hogar en [b]Hong Kong[/b] para investigar y luego unirse los que alguna vez fueron su familia en su juventud. La sinopsis puede sonar muy interesante, pero la trama no termina de ser tan copada. En especial porque ningún personaje es siquiera memorable o querible.

Me dijeron que la historia de este juego era increíble, pero está lleno de clichés, hay un casamiento y ya sabes lo que va pasar a kilómetros. No quiero sonar malo, pero parece que los juegos cuando hacen un juego sobre mafiosos u otros crímenes organizados es como que el único referente parece ser [b]El Padrino[/b] o [b]Scarface[/b], como que no se animan hacer algo más original, creo que lo único interesante es que el protagonista se va enroscando demasiado con el papel que asume y al mismo tiempo se despierta recordando lo último que le dijeron en la anterior misión, mostrando que todo esto le está afectando, pero al mismo tiempo hay cosas que nos hacen dudar sobre qué es lo correcto, seguir o dejarlo ahí.

Hay escenas donde son cortada abruptamente, como si hubieran sido apresuradas o como si no tuvieran una mejor idea para conectar la secuencia de sucesos de una misión. Eso sumado a misiones que te preguntas por qué las pusieron si al final siempre terminan resolviendo las cuestiones muy de la nada, por otra parte, [b]King[/b] no hizo nada y el final…
[spoiler]Se soluciona realmente de la misma manera que casi todo en este juego, con una solución que cae del cielo, el personaje pasa por todo y convenientemente se recupera con gran velocidad.[/spoiler]
Ya que menciono algo con spoilers:
[spoiler]No entiendo para que hay una misión de salvar a Jackie si luego en la siguiente logran matarlo de todas formas.[/spoiler]

El juego cuenta con mecánicas Beat Em Up, ya saben, combate cuerpo a cuerpo como los juegos de la saga [b]Batman Arkham[/b] o el juego de [b]The Warriors[/b] de [b]PlayStation 2[/b] (Este último lo jugué muy poco en lo de un amigo hace varios años). [b]Sleeping Dogs[/b] también cuenta con armas de fuego pero la mayor parte del juego vas a estar dando patadas y piñas, agarres y contraataques. Es por eso que me cuesta verlo como una competencia de [b]Grand Theft Auto[/b] como si puede serlo [b]Saints Row 2[/b].

El juego cuenta tanto misión principal como objetivos secundarios y maletines con plata repartidos por todo el mapa. Algunos favores (las misiones secundarias/terciarias) de relaciones amorosas nos la van a marcar en el mapa, ya que hablo de esto, me pareció muy irónico que el personaje se ponga celoso con una de las tantas chicas que Wei sale con tres a la vez, muy ridículo todo.

Lo que tiene de interesante es que la trama presenta al protagonista no solo como un policía con experiencia como infiltrado, sino también como alguien con cierta personalidad peligrosa a la hora de tomar el papel de criminal, así que se podría decir que lo que hagamos en nuestro juego libre se justifica argumentalmente.

Gráficamente y el diseño de las calles se ve bastante bien para su época y se siente atmosférico, pero algunas animaciones son un poco extrañas, cosa curiosa porque hay algunas que están bien para su época como que el personaje tiene animaciones hasta para cuando baja o sube escalones. También es medio raro la manera en la que algunos NPCs empiezan a girar en círculos sin saber por donde ir ya que hay momentos donde ponen bastantes peatones en la calle. Todo parecería indicar que es un juego de bajo presupuesto si olvidáramos que esto fue distribuido por [b]Square Enix[/b]. En todo caso ver que el traje de [b]Agente 47[/b] (Cuando todavía tenían la propiedad intelectual de [b]Hitman[/b]) y de [b]Adam Jensen[/b] de [b]Deus Ex[/b] se puede comprar en este juego para nuestro personaje. Al igual que todos los atuendos legendarios traen un bonus como lo pueden ser resistencias o aumentos de daño.

Así que mientras gráficamente esta dentro de todo bien, es al final del día el apartado artístico se pone al hombro esta obra para volverlo algo casi sobresaliente en lo visual, si no fuese que después ves que hay negocios que son solo seis imágenes para dar profundidad a un interior que no existe.

Es rarísimo que la mayoría de los autos sean tipo británicos, es decir, el volante en el lado derecho, cuando se supone que siendo en [b]China[/b] debería estar del lado izquierdo como en el resto del mundo. Lo que sí estuve viendo que si es como en [b]Reino Unido[/b] es que se dobla para la izquierda y el carril de la derecha es contramano, capaz por eso se mandaron la primera pifeada que mencioné.

También cuenta con un sistema de puntos de habilidad, ya sea intentando obrar como buenos policías evitando el caos y a su vez actuar como alguien de la tríada.

Esta bueno que tenga desafíos tipo: Mejor combo o Mayor tiempo manejando sin daños. Que tenga una comparativa con tus amigos que jugaron el juego es un buen toque. Lo que si me sorprendió es que pese a que hay marcadores con el record de tus amigos, no hay guardado en la nube. Me sorprende tanto como el hecho de que no tiene doblaje en Cantones siendo que el juego se desarrolla en [b]Hong Kong[/b].

La policía en este juego deja muchísimo que desear, no solo es super fácil escaparte, a veces con chocarlos es suficiente para cortar la persecución, sino que encima no parecen reaccionar cuando peleas contra otros criminales.

Es raro que se hayan fijado en detalles más pequeños como que los NPCs se puedan subir al taxi que robaste para luego bajarse al ver que no sos un taxista de verdad, pero no hayan pulido la inteligencia artificial de la policía o las mecánicas de los tiroteos, que te recuerdan el por qué este juego se enfoca más en las peleas.

Mi primer contacto con este juego fue un intento multijugador de este mismo juego llamado [b]Triad Wars[/b], el cual paso sin pena ni gloria. Pero por lo menos puedo decirles que [b]Sleeping Dogs[/b] pese a que esta sobrevalorado, si que vale la pena darle una oportunidad si le llama algo de lo que les dije.

[h1]Conclusión:[/h1]

No lo jueguen pensando que va ser un [b]Grand Theft Auto[/b], es más, no lo jueguen en base a todas las rosas que le echan al juego, porque sino van a salir decepcionados. Es buen juego pero intenta algo ligeramente distinto a lo que es [b]GTA[/b], en especial porque este juego por momentos es bastante arcade, con la opción de pegar dash/embestida con los coches y que los tiroteos en vehículo tengan tantas explosiones y cámara lenta al punto de que parece película serie B.

Se vuelve monótono por lo repetitivas que son varias cosas del juego, algunas repetidas adrede, como los favores o también lo de ver en las cámaras de seguridad y atrapar a los dealers, unas cuantas veces siempre de la misma manera, vas, pirateas la cámara y luego el juego te marca quién es el que tenes que capturar si tardas en decidirte. Siendo unas 12 o 22 horas de juego y un poco más si queres terminar el contenido extra.
